parts.text: {"word":"late","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"遅れた、遅い、延滞した","english_definition":"happening after the expected, proper, or usual time.","examples":[{"sentence":"I'm sorry I'm late.","translation":"遅れてすみません。"},{"sentence":"The train was late due to bad weather.","translation":"悪天候のため、電車が遅れました。"},{"sentence":"He's always late for meetings.","translation":"彼はいつも会議に遅刻する。"},{"sentence":"The payment is late.","translation":"支払いが遅れています。"}],"collocations":["late arrival (遅刻)","late payment (延滞)","late train (遅延した電車)","late at night (夜遅くに)","too late (手遅れ)","better late than never (遅れても何もしないよりはまし)"],"synonyms":["delayed","tardy","behind schedule","overdue"],"antonyms":["early","on time","punctual"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"最近の、近頃の、最新の","english_definition":"having occurred, done, or been brought about not long ago; recent.","examples":[{"sentence":"Have you seen the late news?","translation":"最近のニュースを見ましたか？"},{"sentence":"What are his late works like?","translation":"彼の近年の作品はどんな感じですか？"},{"sentence":"The late developments in technology are impressive.","translation":"最近の技術の発展は目覚ましい。"}],"collocations":["late news (最新ニュース)","late developments (最近の発展)","late trends (最近のトレンド)","of late (近頃)"],"synonyms":["recent","new","latest","current"],"antonyms":["old","past","former"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"故～、亡くなった～","english_definition":"having died; deceased.","examples":[{"sentence":"We mourn the loss of our late colleague.","translation":"私たちは亡くなった同僚の死を悼みます。"},{"sentence":"The late president was a great leader.","translation":"故大統領は偉大な指導者でした。"},{"sentence":"The late Mr. Smith was a generous benefactor.","translation":"故スミス氏は寛大な恩人でした。"}],"collocations":["the late president (故大統領)","the late Mr./Ms. (故～氏/～さん)","late father/mother (亡き父/母)"],"synonyms":["deceased","departed","dead"],"antonyms":["living","alive"]},{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"遅く、遅れて","english_definition":"after the proper, expected, or usual time.","examples":[{"sentence":"He arrived late.","translation":"彼は遅れて到着した。"},{"sentence":"Don't stay up too late.","translation":"あまり夜更かししないでください。"},{"sentence":"She works late on Fridays.","translation":"彼女は金曜日は遅くまで働く。"}],"collocations":["arrive late (遅れて到着する)","stay up late (夜更かしする)","work late (遅くまで働く)","sleep late (遅くまで寝る)"],"synonyms":["belatedly","tardily"],"antonyms":["early","promptly"]},{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"最近、近頃","english_definition":"recently; lately.","examples":[{"sentence":"I haven't seen him late.","translation":"最近彼に会っていません。"},{"sentence":"What have you been doing late?","translation":"最近は何をしていましたか？"}],"collocations":["of late (近頃)"],"synonyms":["recently","lately"],"antonyms":["formerly","previously"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(通例the late)最近亡くなった人","english_definition":"(usually the late) a person who has recently died.","examples":[{"sentence":"We remember the late of our company.","translation":"私たちは会社の最近亡くなった人を偲びます。"}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":["deceased"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"古英語の「læt」（遅い、遅れた）に由来。ゲルマン祖語の「*lataz」（遅い）に遡る。時間的な遅れの意味から、最近の、亡くなったという意味に派生した。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/leɪt/","syllables":"late"},"inflection":{"adjective_forms":{"comparative":"later","superlative":"latest"},"adverb_forms":{"comparative":"later","superlative":"latest"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**late**」は、時間的な遅れを表す基本的な単語ですが、意味の広がりがあります。時間的な遅れを表す形容詞・副詞としての用法が最も一般的ですが、「最近の」「故～」といった意味もあります。形容詞としては、名詞の前に置かれる限定用法と、be動詞の後に置かれる叙述用法があります。副詞としては、動詞を修飾します。「of late」は「近頃」という意味の決まり文句です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I'm sorry for being late.","correct":"✓ I'm sorry for being late.","note":"「遅れてすみません」は "I'm sorry for being late." が一般的です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is late to arrive.","correct":"✓ He is late to arrive. / ✓ He is late in arriving.","note":"「～するのが遅い」は "late to do" もしくは "late in doing" の形を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The late news are interesting.","correct":"✓ The late news is interesting.","note":"「news」は不可算名詞なので、動詞は単数形になります。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["lately (副詞: 最近、近頃)","lateness (名詞: 遅刻、遅延)"],"idioms_phrases":["better late than never (遅れても何もしないよりはまし)","of late (近頃)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2","frequency_google_ngram":"非常に高頻度 (Very high frequency) - 英語のコア語彙の一つ。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A2","text":"「**late**」は「おそい」という意味の言葉です。時間や予定より遅れたときに使います。例えば、「I am late.（私は遅刻です）」や「The train is late.（電車が遅れています）」のように使います。また、「さいきん」という意味もあり、「late news（最近のニュース）」のように使います。亡くなった人を指すときにも「the late Mr. Smith（故スミスさん）」のように使います。いろいろな意味があるので、文脈で判断しましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The movie started **late**.","translation":"映画は遅れて始まった。","type":"adverb","meaning_category":"遅れて"},{"sentence":"She's always **late** for school.","translation":"彼女はいつも学校に遅刻する。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"遅れた"},{"sentence":"Have you seen the **late** show?","translation":"最近のショーを見ましたか？","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"最近の"},{"sentence":"We paid tribute to our **late** friend.","translation":"私たちは亡くなった友人に敬意を表した。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"故～"},{"sentence":"It's getting **late**.","translation":"遅くなってきた。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"遅い"},{"sentence":"**Of late**, I've been feeling tired.","translation":"近頃、疲れている。","type":"adverb (phrase)","meaning_category":"最近"}]}
